name: Fool's Gold: Dice, Death & Dating Demo
name_original: Fool's Gold: Dice, Death & Dating Demo
description:
Keep up to date:

  • Fool's Gold Discord
  • Newsletter
  • Twitter
  • Feedback Form

Fool's Gold: Dice, Death & Dating is a TTRPG-inspired dating adventure game in which you, a daring adventurer, dive into the world's deadliest jungle to get a hot date for the annual Bundariko Ball.

Your adventure will take you through a deadly jungle before you find your way to the town of Bundariko, a ramshackle little dive full of adventurers, cultists, and single bachelors.

Who will you try to woo? The druid? The magical girl? The monster? Or others? Well, perhaps first try to make sure your choices and dice rolls don't get you killed and THEN worry about the smoochin'.

And of course, don't trust the monkey.

This is our first ever public prototype of this game, and we'd love to get your feedback on it! Our goal is to develop this into a full release, adding more features, such as characters, extended quest & date paths, way more puzzles, and even more chaos.

SEND A VALENTINE'S DAY CARD TO YOUR FRIEND (OR ENEMY)

There are blank cards if you want to make your own, or you can use the ones straight from the Fool's Gold crew! These are the perfect valentine's day cards to express your true feelings to those you care for, or hate. Who wouldn't swoon over that sweet message from Sips to set the mood?

GRAB YOUR CARDS HERE

Feel free to stream the game!
